title: Nike Mens Pro Training Compression Shorts
description: Nike Dri-FIT technology moves sweat away from your skin for quicker evaporation, helping you stay dry and comfortable
Mesh at the inseam and upper seat lets air flow to help keep you cool
A double-layer mesh gusset in front prioritizes breathability where you need it most
Nike Dri-FIT technology moves sweat away from your skin for quicker evaporation, helping you stay dry and comfortable

LIGHTWEIGHT SUPPORT THAT'S PRIMED TO PERFORM. Much more than a base layer, the Nike Pro Bike Shorts hug you with lightweight fabric that helps keep you feeling dry, cool and supported from warm-ups through cooldowns. They're made with at least 75% recycled polyester fibers in a stretchy design that helps you move at full intensity during your toughest workouts or competitions. Customize with your team's colors for a coordinated look.
